heading: HR00959
0:
RESOLUTION URGING LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS (LGUs) TO UTILIZE THE
FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE RECEIVED FROM THE NATIONAL
GOVERNMENT FOR THEIR PROJECTS AND ACTIVITIES
RELATED TO THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC, AND TO FORMULATE
THEIR ECONOMIC RECOVERY PROGRAMS IN ACCORDANCE
WITH THEIR APPROVED LOCAL DEVELOPMENT PLANS
status: Pending with the Committee on DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE since 2020-06-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00959
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNITS (LGUs) TO UTILIZE THE FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE RECEIVED FROM THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT FOR THEIR PROJECTS AND ACTIVITIES RELATED TO THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC, AND TO FORMULATE THEIR ECONOMIC RECOVERY PROGRAMS IN ACCORDANCE WITH THEIR APPROVED LOCAL DEVELOPMENT PLANS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CUARESMA, LUISA LLOREN
DATE FILED : 2020-06-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON DEFEAT COVID-19 AD-HOC COMMITTEE ON 2020-06-05
